roleset.name: Whisper loudly so that audience can hear
roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in wsj-nw. Framed by Claire, comparison to whisper.01.

example.name: Args 0 & 1 only
example.text: [`` She 's being attacked by the demon , '']-1 Mrs. Warren stagewhispers *T*-1 as the priest sprinkles holy water over the squirming woman , and the television camera grinds .
example.arg: as the priest sprinkles holy water over the squirming woman , and the television camera grinds .
